medium: Pen and brown and black ink and gray wash over black chalk
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, New York, Jan. 25, 2002, lot 118; [Collins Paintings and Drawings, New York, in 2004; sold to MIA]
signed: LLC, in black ink: [Paul Gregoire/ 1794.]; at bottom edge, L of center, in black chalk: [Paul Gregoire 1794.]
title: Bacchanal with a Statue of Ceres
